title: GlossaryTermRelationSettings
description: This schema defines the Glossary Term Relation Settings for configuring typed semantic relations between glossary terms.

glossaryTermRelationType.description: Definition of a glossary term relation type.

name.description: Unique name of the relation type (e.g., 'broader', 'synonym').

displayName.description: Display name for the relation type.

description.description: Description of what this relation type represents.

inverseRelation.description: Name of the inverse relation type (e.g., 'narrower' for 'broader'). Null for symmetric relations.

rdfPredicate.description: RDF predicate URI for this relation (e.g., 'skos:broader').

isSymmetric.description: Whether the relation is symmetric (A relates B implies B relates A).

isTransitive.description: Whether the relation is transitive (A relates B, B relates C implies A relates C).

isCrossGlossaryAllowed.description: Whether relations can be created between terms in different glossaries.

isSystemDefined.description: Whether this is a system-defined relation type (cannot be deleted).

color.description: Hex color code for visualizing this relation type in graphs (e.g., '#1890ff').

relationTypes.description: List of configured glossary term relation types.
